EmailTemplate.description: Template used for email notification sent to submitter to recall Test Execution
EmailTemplate.name: MICO Test Execution Recall Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Test Execution Recall Notification - {!MICO_Test__c.Description__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!MICO_Test_Templates__c.Approver__c}, The Approval request for Test Script {!MICO_Test_Templates__c.Title__c} has been recalled.
Many thanks, {!MICO_Test_Templates__c.Submitter__c}
